title: Colonizer In-Laws, FREE RANCH PLEASE 3.9.21
itunes:title: Colonizer In-Laws, FREE RANCH PLEASE 3.9.21
description:
In episode 827, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and creator Kareem Rahma to discuss the Harry and Meghan interview with Oprah, the CDC's new guidelines for those who have been vaccinated, the cancellation of Pepe Le Pew, the documentary Can’t Get You Out of My Head, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Harry and Meghan interview fallout
  2. CDC Comes Around To Issuing Guidance For What The Vaccinated Can Do
  3. Will these ranch dressing vending machines leave Angelenos drunk with power?
  4. NY Times Columnist Defends Saying Pepe Le Pew ‘Normalized Rape Culture’ After Right-Wing Backlash
  5. The Looney Tunes Feature Films That Never Were
  6. Pepe Le Pew removed from 'Space Jam' sequel
  7. Adam Curtis knows why we all keep falling for conspiracy theories
  8. WATCH: Lapalux - LPLX - NO HRT

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
